about_the_game:
Cute animal-themed accessories!

A set of animal-themed headbands for Sophie, Plachta, Ramizel, Alette, Olias, and Diebold.

Note: The accessories can be changed in the "Changing Room" at the desk in the atelier.
Please visit the official website for more information.
